RumorFact.Text: I met a fellow Hearthian named Bonford at the north pole of this planet. Supposedly, they were the first Hearthian to be a pilot for Outer Wilds Ventures, however when their ship malfunctioned, they were stranded for a long time. I told Bonford about the Nomai and the Eye, and they told me to go to the Eye if it's so important. Will do, Bonford.
